vulnerabilities.title: @envelop/graphql-modules has a Race Condition vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description:
### Summary
Context race condition when using `useGraphQLModules` plugin

### Details

Related to: https://github.com/graphql-hive/graphql-modules/security/advisories/GHSA-53wg-r69p-v3r7

When 2 or more parallel requests are made which trigger the same service, the context of the requests is mixed up in the service when the context is injected via @ExecutionContext() and graphql-modules are used in Yoga with `useGraphQLModules(application)`. This issue was fixed in `graphql-modules` in `2.4.1` a
